title: Healthcare Practice Competency Enhancement: E-Learning Platform Awareness Measurement and Utilization Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Apply the perceived usefulness of an e-learning platform to three or more mathematics education scenarios
Develop e-learning platform evaluation criteria based on Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) elements (perceived ease of use, attitude, etc.)
Incorporate content and pedagogy elements by over 80% when designing e-learning content implementable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
